short_summary: This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for the following category:Stream 2: Business Consulting / Change Management StreamSub-Stream 2.11: Information / Records Management / Record Keeping Specialist
description: This bid solicitation process is to establish a contract with Task Authorizations for the delivery of this requirement. Proposed period of contract: The proposed period of any resulting contract will be for one (1) year from contract award plus three (3) one-year option periods to extend.
